Oct. 17, 1982 D NWABBA Preston District Contest (Section D)
NWABBA Preston District Contest (Section D) 130 Test Piece Contest Fleetwood Contest (NWABBA Preston District Contest) nwabba-preston-district-contest-section-d

Sounds of Brass Suite
Marine Hall, Fleetwood, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £80 and trophy, 2nd £60 and trophy, 3rd £40 and trophy. 10 bands competed. 34th annual contest.
June 25, 2014, 4:27 p.m. Jan. 12, 2015, 1:09 p.m.
